quotes.Walt Disney: The Best Way To Get Started Is To Quit Talking And Begin Doing.
quotes.Winston Churchill: The Pessimist Sees Difficulty In Every Opportunity. The Optimist Sees Opportunity In Every Difficulty.
quotes.Will Rogers: Don’t Let Yesterday Take Up Too Much Of Today.
quotes.Unknown: You Learn More From Failure Than From Success. Don’t Let It Stop You. Failure Builds Character.
quotes.Vince Lombardi: It’s Not Whether You Get Knocked Down, It’s Whether You Get Up.
quotes.Rob Siltanen: People Who Are Crazy Enough To Think They Can Change The World, Are The Ones Who Do.
quotes.Og Mandino: Failure Will Never Overtake Me If My Determination To Succeed Is Strong Enough.
quotes.Maya Angelou: We May Encounter Many Defeats But We Must Not Be Defeated.
quotes.Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe: Knowing Is Not Enough; We Must Apply. Wishing Is Not Enough; We Must Do.
quotes.Dr. Henry Link: We Generate Fears While We Sit. We Overcome Them By Action.
quotes.Henry Ford: Whether You Think You Can Or Think You Can’t, You’re Right.
quotes.Helen Keller: Security Is Mostly A Superstition. Life Is Either A Daring Adventure Or Nothing.
quotes.Hasidic Proverb: The Man Who Has Confidence In Himself Gains The Confidence Of Others.
quotes.Franklin D. Roosevelt: The Only Limit To Our Realization Of Tomorrow Will Be Our Doubts Of Today.
quotes.Theodore Roosevelt: Do What You Can With All You Have, Wherever You Are.
quotes.C.S. Lewis: You Are Never Too Old To Set Another Goal Or To Dream A New Dream.
quotes.Confucius: To See What Is Right And Not Do It Is A Lack Of Courage.
quotes.Jack Canfield: For Every Reason It’s Not Possible, There Are Hundreds Of People Who Have Faced The Same Circumstances And Succeeded.
quotes.John Wooden: Things Work Out Best For Those Who Make The Best Of How Things Work Out.
quotes.Steve Jobs: The Only Way To Do Great Work Is To Love What You Do. If You Haven’t Found It Yet, Keep Looking. Don’t Settle.

dares: Call a friend, pretend it's their birthday, and sing them Happy Birthday to You, and share your screen the whole time.
Name a famous person that looks like each player.
Show everyone your best dance moves.
Let the group decide your nickname in this server for the next week.
Let the group decide your status for three days.
In the next ten minutes, find a way to scare another player and make it a surprise.
Lay on the floor and act like a sizzling piece of bacon.
Empty a glass of cold water onto your head.
Play air guitar for one minute.
Demonstrate how you style your hair in the mirror (without actually using the mirror).
Repeat everything the last player says until your next turn.
Draw your favorite movie and have the other person guess it (Pictionary-style).
Put five ice cubes in your mouth without chewing them, and wait for them to melt.
Do a plank for a full minute.
Dump out your purse, backpack, or pockets and do a show and tell of what's inside.
